channel.title: Marijuana?
channel.description: What is your opinion of this drug? I'm not asking for if you do it, or if you don't. I'm simply asking for your MATURE opinion of this drug. Please, don't say it's a plant, not a drug. A drug is a narcotic, a narcotic is something that alters your mind. Marijuana certainly altars your mind.

item.title: Marijuana?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:15, topic:442866”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=545551.msg3998868#msg3998868 date=1337652119]
No, my drug and alcohol test did say that. I just might have the words confused.
[/quote]

Very rarely does marijuana cause hallucinations.[/quote]

It’s classified as a hallucinogenic drug. Just because it doesn’t act like shrooms doesn’t make it hallucinogenic. It acts upon the senses.

Read full topic

item.title: Marijuana?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“Xellium, post:25, topic:442866”][quote author=Niall link=topic=545551.msg3998893#msg3998893 date=1337654767]

http://www.worldstaruncut.com/uncut/46824

That’s what I think of drugs.

Is getting high worth these people’s lives? Fucking selfish. The greed of American’s want for drugs, and the greed of these drug traffickers getting paid is costing tons of innocent lives.

is getting rich worth these people’s lives? fucking selfish. the greed of americans private prisons want for prisoners, and the greed of these private prisons getting paid is costing tons of innocent lives

protip: legalise drugs and the drug cartel will no longer have any customers
[/quote]

This ^

If people want to do cocaine, and heroin. Let them kill themselves. We spend 4 billion dollars a year on the DEA. This would help save the American Economy some money. Granted, we will still need the DEA, because no matter what, people will still sell it to minors, or illegally to avoid tax.[/quote]
Yes because we all want people on cocaine, and meth driving around beating the fuck out of people for no reason.

Read full topic

If people want to do cocaine, and heroin. Let them kill themselves. We spend 4 billion dollars a year on the DEA. This would help save the American Economy some money. Granted, we will still need the DEA, because no matter what, people will still sell it to minors, or illegally to avoid tax.

Anyways, I have nothing against the drug. It helps more than it hurts from what I can tell. It has medical benefits and solves eating disorders. It’s also organic for all of those health freaks.[/quote]
